resources.string: Here are a few tips to get you started:
\t• If you\'re not a registered employee, you can log a handwash by entering employee number 0 on the main screen.
\t• To access admin features (add employees, reports, etc.), tap the menu icon (⋮) on the main screen and select \"Admin Login\".
\t• Default Admin Password: admin (Please change this in the Admin Dashboard!)
\t• You can add up to 15 employees.
\t• Employee CSV import is not available.
\t• Custom logo upload is not available.
